featured.text: Currently, health care costs account for __(37)__ twelve percent of the gross domestic product.
Plastics used to account for as little as 10% of medical waste in the late 1970s, before disposables began rapidly replacing reusables.
Today, tea can be drunk at any time of the day, and accounts for over two-fifths of all beverages consumed in Britain—with the exception of water.
The scientist’s project to build a modern laboratory was __________ on account of its huge budget.

definition.en_def: A record or statement of financial expenditure or receipts relating to a particular period or purpose.
definition.example: She opened a bank account to save money for her vacation.
